metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45038 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.5, 1.36.x before 1.36.3, and 1.37.x before 1.37.1. By using an action=rollback query, attackers can view private wiki contents.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45038` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.35.5-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.35.5-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> include upstream dda5355c0ee804c94ff371a8a16c4a2a8e4436bd as a prerequisite to the fix for this CVE to make it apply more cleanly. introduced in 0a8403271109 (v1.33.0)

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.35.5-1').
